readable.title: 2600386812_8790879d9a
readable.content: A brown dog is standing in the water watching the waves of the ocean on a sunny day . A brown dog steadies himself on the rocky shore of the ocean , with several waves coming in . A red dog stands in a rocky shore , its feet in the sea . The brown dog is in the waving water . The brown dog is standing on the beach as the waves lap up around its feet .
